description: Nice and clean hostel with secure parking for bicycles and motorcycles. I paid 450 rupees for a night (off-season), and 550 the next one because there was a cricket match in town and they were at capacity. Dorms with 4, 6 or 9 beds. Wifi and food available there.

name: Ferry
description:
This ferry (from GAURIPIR to FAKIRGANJ) is full of friendly locals :) they will watch at you like in Italy we look tourists drinking cappuccino after noon. 
Price 70 rupies , included vespa. There is space for 2 cars or a van. 1,5h long 
Enjoy!!

Ps please let me know if there will be any other overlander passing by here in the story of humanity 

Ps no schedules

name: Living Root Bridge
description: Here you can find a living root bridge, tiny, but 1 min from the road.

name: Jowai-Dawki Rd
description: The best view from Bangladesh, up to a tree.

name: Double Living Root Bridge
description: From here the trail starts. Quite steep, about 30/40 min, not recommended for old person without training. Here I left my vespa, to this kind family. You can reach this location with a small jeep easily.

name: Loomkyntoor Resort
description:
This is a paradise corner in this wonderful region. Next to 2 waterfalls and 3 Km away from Phe Phe Falls. I really recommend to recharge your batteries here ;)
500/pp rupies for your own tent 
6000 rupies for the room
15.000 rupies for the villa 

Big campsite for big vans 
Road is not asphalt but still ok till this resort.

Super quiet and super nice people (especially Monica).

Teibor, the owner, is a nice guy.
(9366532636)

name: Unakoti
description: This is a place you MUST Visit! I could park inside, it’s free, consider 1 or 2 hours for visiting it

name: Zokhua at Falkawn
description:
Interesting village copy of a typical Mizo one.
20rp, i'st worth a visit if you pass nearby.

name: Vantawng Khawhthla Waterfall Viewpoint
description:
With a wonderful view over the waterfall. 
Quiet and bit dirty.

name: DAWN HOMESTAY
description:
Rovi, the owner, is a super kind and sweet woman. I stayed 4 days, parked my Vespa when I visited the valley. I really suggest to come here 
Please greet her for me (the Italian guy on a Vespa).

name: ARUNACHAL PRADESH PERMIT
description:
I came here in this super new building because on the internet there is not much information for travelers (at least if you go by an agency you don’t need to do nothing)… so I came here, I filedl the 2 forms, one picture, 50$. Manab, the employer is super kind. He told me in 3/4 days, he will provide my permit.
Better if you go there with more than one person, otherwise ask Manab if he can join you with another person (just to be able to roam around Arunachal as much as you can). 
It opens at 10:30
I’m saving you a lot of time guys. I came here just for the permit from Kohima on my vespa but ask Manab if you can do it online, much easier.

Manab 
+91 98649 29052

name: Soccer Field
description:
Perfect place next to the river and an institute, the manager is super kind, a lot of space and tap water inside the building of the institute. 
Enjoy.

name: Heavenly Getaways Tours
description:
Nikki Dorjee Bhutia from  Heavenly Getaways tour and travel. Darjeeling. We specialise in trekking and hiking around the Himalayan belts in India and Nepal. We also have tour packages covering parts of North East India and Bhutan as well. 
In Darjeeling we provide services like local sightseeing and hiking. We also have a bike and scooter for rental. Extra activities like river rafting , paragliding and rock climbing are also a part of our services. 

Hotel and Homestay Booking/flight, train, and bus services are also available.

+91 7679811868. What’s app

name: SIKKIM PERMIT (second part)
description:
Here you can obtain your permit, super fast and free. The only problem is parking if you are on 4 wheels 
But first you must apply for permission from police here 

27.040664, 88.265617
(Foreigner registration office)

2 step process

name: Indian Immigration Office
description: Here is the Indian immigration office.  Very easy.

name: Jaigaon Land Customs Station
description: Here you can find the Jaigaon Land Customs Station.

name: Street Parking
description: You can choose whether to stay in the small wide area by the road, hidden by the pine trees, or to go down the dirt road to reach the flat meadow but visible from the road.  We slept one night, no one disturbed us.  Cars pass on the road until late at night.  Only place found in the area. There Is a little fast food point.

name: Krishnagiri
description:
A2B Restaurant..
Very Fine Vegetarian Restaurant.
South Indian, North Indian Dishes Available. 
+Rest Room is also Some what neat

name: Shrine Yatra
description:
If you are looking for the best travel agency & tour operator for any trip, then the name of Shrine Yatra comes first. With an experience of more than 7 years, Shrine Yatra is engaged in the noble cause of helping pilgrims fulfill their long-standing desire to complete their pilgrimage at the most cost-effective package.

Shrine Yatra is a registered company under the Indian Government, which is most popular for conducting pilgrimage travel packages with its best service. Its head office is Delhi based and it also has many more branch offices located in Haridwar, Prayagraj, Jaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai and Ahmedabad.

name: Le Fort Homestay
description: Oasis in Jaipur with safe motorbike parking! Double room was 1800 per night and included a living room, bedroom and spacious bathroom. Cleanest we had in months! Peaceful rooftop terrace with restaurant and great a la carte breakfast. Free filtered water. Alif, the owner, is a very kind and helpful person and gives great advice. He even allowed us to do an oil change in his yard! Amazing place!

name: FIAA/WIAA Automobile Association
description:
Here is the office of the two Automobile Associations FIAA & WIAA.
Here you can get assistance to renew or extend your Carnet des Passage.

Contact person is Ranjit Kaur Virk fiaaindia@gmail.com

name: Roadside near Village Chango
description: A detour of 100m from the main road from Sumdo to Nako on the roadside.

name: Tanishq Tour & Travel
description: Change money. Rate is ok. He will ask you to subscribe to his YouTube channel but nice man.

name: Taj Street Hostel
description: Nice hostel with dorms and private rooms (we paid 1250 per night for a double room). Safe parking inside for 2 motorbikes! Just 10min walking distance to the Taj Mahal East gate. Very friendly staff.

name: Pavan residency
description: Hotel in a nice area with safe parking inside for motorbikes or one car. The owners were super nice. We negotiated 1000 INR for a double room, not the highest standard but okay. Off-season (tiger park closed until mid November).

name: Chandriga Devil Temple
description: The only place so far in India that we found relaxation and had privacy.  We stayed here for almost 2 weeks just to make a plan for the other researching of India

name: Riverside Hotel and Restaurant
description: Very clean and spacious rooms, nice bathroom. We negotiated 1200 R during off season. Restaurant is also very good, try the Chili Mushroom dish. No WiFi.

name: Rustic Paradise huts and restaurant
description:
Mountain Cottages & Tents 
Enjoy the peace and tranquility of a rural setting! Exquisite mountain views,a beautiful boulder garden and comfiest beds

name: Hotel Hill Inn parking
description: The owners of this hotel very kindly let us park our campervan in their car park and use their toilet for free (despite us offering to pay a small sum). The parking is on a flat paved section next to the road, but it is set back enough that we weren’t bothered by traffic when sleeping in the van. No height restriction, and we got our 6.3m long x 2m wide van in ok, but you might struggle with a bigger rig. Space for 4 cars. The hotel seems to be half finished but we were offered a room so clearly some rooms are operational. Good for one night on the way to Shimla. The restaurant 50m away called Valley Vibes had really delicious food!

name: Siliserh Lake
description: This is a farm across Siliserh Lake Palace. You camp here when there are no crops on the field. There are nearby wells for water supply. No electricity. Curious villagers living across the nearby hill may stop by. Don't venture into Lake as there are crocodiles.

name: Immigration and Customs Office. Raxaul, India
description: Small office, passport and address in India required. You can park your vehicle at the opposite street side of the office.

name: Parking next to toilet
description: That's the best place I've found in Varanasi for parking my car, It's completely free because it's a government property and many taxi driver are parking here.  It's also very secure to be caused nearby or hotels and there are many security cameras the best thing it is toilet which is almost next to my car where I can do my sheet and also I can wash myself for ₹10. I stayed here for 7 days and nobody was bothering me so I highly suggest it. Taxi driver are more educated and they can speak English so it was easy to communicate and not so many  buggers around.

name: Public water tap, good pressure
description: Next to the road, you can fill your water tank. In front of Dr Lal PathLabs. Enough place to park without disturbing the traffic. Good pressure.

name: Flat parking in countryside
description: What a chance to have found this parking ! Quiet all night long, flat, and easy to reach with any vehicle. This is a place where trucks use to park, only one driver came at 9 am to leave, no problem to stay here apparently.

name: Torque Block (Tyres)
description:
Distribution shop that stocks A-brand  motorcycle tubeless tyres for big bikes. Offers Shinko/Pirelli/Mitas/Michelin and also some local brands. On their website it seems they also stock 4x4 rubber. 

Their main office is in Bengaluru so make sure you contact them in advance to ship your order to Delhi. Shipping was free of charge and only 2 days. 

Installation is possible at mechanic 100m down the road. Owner will help you arrange it.

name: Parking ok for long vehicles
description: It's mission impossible to find a free place in Shimla!  Here, we are well located for exploring the city, the view is great, we park flat, and access is easy (we have more than 7m in length).  From 9 p.m. the parking lot is very quiet.  Unfortunately, we pay 400 rupees/24 hours, non-negotiable (but we haven't found any cheaper)... Be careful to respect the 24 hours because we had to pay 300 rupees for only 20 minutes more!

name: Quiet place in the forest
description: Quiet place to stopover.  Easy to access with any type of vehicle.  Close to the road but hidden by trees and very quiet at night.

name: In the woods
description:
We had a quiet night at this nice place close to a lake. Nobody disturbed us. In the evening there was plenty of noise and music from a nearby party location, but after 10pm it was quiet.
No 4x4 needed.

name: Taj Street Hostel parking
description:
Great place to stay in Agra. we parked our car in the backyard and took valuables with us in the room. I am sure you can also sleep in the car when you pay for a dorm-bed.
Got dinner and an early breakfast. 
quiet place, nice rooftop.
I would give 5 stars for indian standard.
A Troopy size car can drive there, sorry for bigger rigs...

name: Free parking near Taj Mahal
description: This is the parking of the crematorium, it's free, and we spent 1 night without any problem. It's only 10-min walk from the Taj Mahal entrance (take the little road passing in front of the crematorium and then take the path in the park). There's a big bin.

name: Rest Station
description: Very big Rest Station. Good for a night. When we were here it was an abondoned place (11-23). Its so new, that it was not opened yet.... so: no facilities, but very quiet at the Express Highway, that we could spend a good quiet night.

name: roadside desert camp
description:
After almost getting arrested on the way to "sandy area" we decided to stay nearby at the roadside close to one of these desert camps. People where friendly and said it's ok to camp here.
Some party noise from camp in the evening and quiet at night.

name: kasera paradise
description: Nice hotel in Haveli, restaurant on the roof top

name: Wildlife around
description:
Really great place in the wilderness. We saw wild boars, deer or antelopes, foxes and certainly there are also leopards.
We hided behind the bushes and no human around. 
No 4x4 needed, great 4G Airtel ...

name: Next to road and farm land
description: Nice place on flat area. Approx. 100 m from the road. Easy access. Some friendly locals came and offered tea. You can hear the road during the night, but no other disturbance. We stayed 2 nights.

name: Parking on wasteland
description: This vacant lot isn't the sexiest place to park, but it has several advantages.  The area is very quiet, no one disturbed us and we slept very well for 2 nights.  Right opposite, very nice little café.  15 minutes from the historic center by rickshaw (150 rupees).  Right outside there is a student library with free Wi-Fi where we were allowed to come and work.  The land is certainly very dirty, but it is flat and it is free.

name: Balaji Temple Sathani
description:
The location is in the woods, 200m before you reach the small temple. Go to the temple talk to the Baba and leave a donation. He will probably ask you to stay on the temple terrain with water and clean bathrooms. We decided to sleep in the woods to avoid the light around the temple.
Some people are around but very friendly.  
Good Airtel connection.

name: Hotel Krishna
description:
Pure veg hotel & restaurant.
We could spend the night on their parking lot and in return we had dinner in the restaurant.

name: 3 public tap water
description: next to the road, easy to park big trucks, 3 tap water to fill your tank. The pressure isn't really good but it makes the job.

name: Nagda Farm and Campsite
description:
This place is a farm near a seasonal waterfall and Ancient Temple called Nalkeshwar . The property is near a Water reservoir which adds up beauty of this place.. The place is 
 near Gwalior city in Madhya Pradesh. You can park your overlander here safely , the owner of the farm is very friendly and welcoming to new people. The place is remote , as of now electricity hasn't reached this village , but you can charge your mobile phones with the solar panel they have. Also the mobile connectivity is good  here, you will get 4g Network here easily , they also have camping equipment for rental. Also if you are staying and parking your vehicle here for a night , they charge you a nominal fee of 6-10 dollars for a Night, which helps them develop this place, making it more secure and reliable for overlanders. You can order in advance for Local delicasy food items , they make it fresh in Pure desi ghee. there phone number can be found on google map if you search - Nagda Campsite Gwalior.
Also there are rock paintings sites which are nearly 10-20,000 years old near this place which were recently discovered. Any local will guide you to those sites charging you some nominal guide fees

name: Flat parking next to the lake
description: Next to Lambiya lake and little temples, flat parking really quiet, easy to reach with any vehicle. Perfect to make a night stop between Pushkar and Jodhpur. Super good night.

name: MangroveBay EcoCamp
description: Located in the Cuddalore district, 10-acre campus, situated in north side bank of River Kollidam. Our Campus is a beautiful place tucked away in the serene backwaters of river kollidam.

name: Orchha Homestay
description:
Amazing initiative to stay with local families in Orchha. A NGO runs the project with 8 families, so all the money feeds back into the community. We stayed one night with a lovely family and their goats. The rooms are basic but amazing for the price point. Western toilets and bucket shower. 1200 inr per night, breakfast 80 pp, dinner 200 pp (all prepared by the family).

Best to message in advance for booking: +91 99817 49660

name: Kedar Guesthouse
description:
Typical Indian rooms but most importantly: cheap (1.150 inr per night for a double) and secured motorcycle parking for up to 3 bikes! Short walk from the Ghats.

There are two locations, if this one is closed you may need to head to 25.284510, 83.004848 first.

name: Hotel Dev Garh
description:
Very nice hotel in a quiet neighborhood. Brand new building, comfortable rooms and very kind stuff.
They have a big parking in front of the house so no problem for your travel rig.
15 min walking distance to downtown.

name: Between Trees
description:
nice flat area between trees. not visible from the road or the nearby village. We gad a quiet night, nobody came by.
Many options to park the car. No 4x4 needed.

name: Old Quarry
description:
Perfect camp spots in an old and overgrown mining area. no fences, no people. No 4x4 needed. Lot's of bushes to hide, not visible from any road.
4G Airtel

name: Hotel Ramayana
description:
Beautiful and quiet place in Khajuraho, clean, tidy, very friendly team.

Amazing food and beautiful view on the roof

name: Rising Adventures
description:
Wonderful campsite in the mountains. Lots of nature around. Access with big rigs may be difficult. Friendly stuff (professional rock climbers). They offer also adventure trips. We  just enjoyed the camping.
We didn't ask for food, but they probably have. 
Airtel 5G , internet not stable, no wifi.

name: Mayur Rathod Campsite
description:
Very well organized and clean campsite. Overlanders are welcome. Small cars can go inside the area, big rigs need to stay outside on the parking. 
Airtel 4G available. 
Quiet place, simply perfect. No fix rates, contributions welcome.

name: Quiet hidden helipad
description: This helipad doesn't seem to be used. The gate is always opened, and people told us we can park here. It's just a 10-minute walk to the cave entrance. Hidden from the main road and really quiet. Ok for any kind of big rigs !

name: Huge land
description: Huge land next to the city. Some cars and motorbikes at the evening but night was quiet and nobody disturbed us. In the morning, people come here to play cricket and make sports, in a really good mood. You can park more than 100 big rigs there !

name: uphill road side
description:
wild camp, ok for the night. Wide open space with a small concrete ruin. Nobody around. Enter 200m after the petrol station and find your place.
You can see and hear the road, but ok ok :-)

name: open field near temple
description:
Open field with some rocks and a small temple. In dry season no 4x4 needed.
Quiet and piecefull. We stopped here for a coffee and think it's a good overnight place away from the main road.

name: small hill
description: Perfect overnight place in the hills. Fare away enough from the next houses. 300m away you see a temple with a parking. That would also be perfect.

name: Petrol starion Kota
description: Indian Oil Petrol a station in Kira. Easy to fill us the LPG tank.

name: Rajasthan Royal Holidays
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: Description provided by owner or manager.

Rajasthan Royal Holidays is a Travel Company Based in Golden City of Rajasthan ( Jaisalmer). Being established in 2010, we started the best travel agency in Jaisalmer. We are offering Holidays and Tour Packages like Rajasthan Tour Packages, Jaisalmer Tour Packages, Jodhpur Tour Packages, Desert Camps, Desert Safari, Dune Bashing,etc.

name: UClean
description: Laundry service, . They do normal cleaning and dry cleaning. 80 roupies/kg (28/11/23)

name: Parking at remote Shiva temple
description: probably one the best wild camps we had in India. Very peaceful and quiet. just very few people pass by.

name: Big Cat Holiday
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: place was added by owner and has not been Overlander verified.

Big Cat Holiday is the best Ranthambore tour operator for tiger and jungle safari.For family tours and outings book a Rajasthan tour operator at the best price.

Big Cat Holiday provides Corporate Tour Operator, we will plan a tiger safari and jeep safari as your Corporate Tour in Ranthambore at affordable rates

Big Cat Holiday Leading Educational Tour Operator, organizes school and college tours at budget rate. We collaborate with institutes to design educational tours.

With our group tour operators, you can easily plan school and college group tours and book a Ranthambore tour package for a group tour on a budget.

name: Fort Pratapgad Parking
description: Nice gravel place under the paved official parking. Busy at daytime,  quiet and peaceful at night. Nobody bothered us. Perfect place to overnight.

name: Bird sanctuary
description: This is a parking lot in Front of the bird sanctuary. We arrived at 10 PM and nobody was there. We had a very quite night. In the morning first cars came, still quite.

name: Accommodation with private parking
description:
Simple Accommodation with different flats close to Mandrem Beach with AC. Our Campervan is 6m long, 2m wide and 3,30m high. We fit in the private parking slot of the garden. If you are much bigger, you might not fit in. The parking is save behind a door. We had a flat with two bedrooms and a living room with kitchen, bathroom, wifi and two ACs for 2 adults and two children and stayed 5 weeks. The owner is a young, really nice, friendly and very helpful, well english speaking guy. There is motorcycles for rent, shops nearby and he can help to find very nice, cheap and save Restaurants. The Beach is 4 minutes walking away. The accommodation has a washing mashine and a well with clean potable drinkingwater. The rooftop is nice to play for kids and you can do yoga there. The owner can help you to find a private yoga teacher for a good price. Its a really nice place to stay with privacy in Goa.

Whattsapp Shubham: +919958021152

name: Zuber
description: Great truck mechanic, does not sell parts, came out and installed a new head gasket on our truck at the Trimandir Temple, Varnama, Vadodara NH 48 car park , if you need a mechanic in this area , he’s a good one

name: Excel Automotive
description:
We travel with a Nissan camper van, which doesn't exist in India, so nobody wanted to fix our mechanical issues, even Nissan garages. 
We finally were advised by an Indian overlanders group to go there. 
Faisal and his crew are really professional. They managed to find solutions for each issue we had. They were really accomodant and helpful. We were allowed to sleep in the van during the repair, with water access. A lot of shops and restaurants in the area, metro station is close. 
We definitely recommend this place if you have any problems with your car. He's specialised in off-road cars, but he's competent in any vehicle. 
Please call or text him before : 
Faisal : +91 96190 88806
Open from 10 am to 8 pm (Monday - Saturday)

name: Timbi Lake
description: Camping spot near Timbi lake, also a lot of birdlife at the lake. Nice to walk around as well, unfortunately a lot of trash in nature.

name: Peace next to a temple
description: 10 minutes from the main road, after a little village, we found this little temple. Nobody around, just sounds of nature. Such a peaceful place ! Perfect for a night.

name: Reliance Petroleum
description: Reliance pump with Visa cards accepted on the road between Goa and Mumbai.

name: Quiet paradise under the trees
description: All along the beach, behind the promenade, you can park under the trees. It's very quiet, very few people, even in December. The white sand beach is clean. Several trash cans available along the promenade and a water pump on the left towards the beach parking lot.  The village is very quiet, there are a few small grocery stores for food shopping.  We spent a very relaxing few days here.

name: Nice and quiete place
description:
Next a indù temple, very quiet, clean and green… the best spot! There is water next the temple’s entrance 
In the night even a big porch roaming around

name: Nice spot
description: One of the few free spot in the National park to stop. Quiete and clean, hidden from the road

name: Abandoned village
description: Incredible place “Chernobyl style”, old abandoned village where you can find place to put your tent but no food or facilities

name: Quiet parking on the beach
description: Uncrowded parking lot after sunset.  Nobody in the morning.  Long white sand beach.  Possible shade.  The last 30 meters are quite narrow, but we got through with our 2.2m wide, 3m high, 7m long van.

name: Goghra, near Nandora Village, Balaghat, MP
description: Riverside camping spot still maintained clean by locals. Niranjan lives closest to the spot. You might like to mention to him or the villagers at Nandora that you are camping at the spot. Enjoy the beautiful river Dev which joins the Narmada at its best here. Moonlit nights and sunrises are amazing! The constant sound of the flow of the river is also worth the effort of wild camping. Lots of firewood around if you want to heat up. Jio SIMs might give some network for calls/ slow internet.

name: Shadow next to the beach
description: Enought space to park 1 big rig, friendly local people told us it's a public area, so no problem to stay. Quiet,  even on Christmas. Road is easy. We spent 2 peaceful nights here. Beach is clean.

name: Bhadrak Bus stop
description: Bhadrak Bus stand odisha near it was also called as Banta Chack Over Bridge

name: Friends Farm
description: If you want to escape from noise and crowded place, you can stay in one of the huts made of naturel materials in the desert. Brean the owner can cook for you, he speaks good english. Call him in advance : 9929924989

name: Star India Bazaar
description: Departmental store for Groceries with Parking

name: Decathlon Sports Motera
description: For overlanding / adventure sports gears ...

name: The Srivatsas
description: This is a home in the center of Bangalore about 4-6kms from anywhere worth hanging out in the City. safe street parking for all size Rigs and you have use of the family's bathroom and some basic Indian/western breakfast food. This family is an overlanding family so may not be around when you want to visit. Will be wise to email them vatsacom@yahoo.com before the visit. they have a cool terrace/roof top where you can pitch tents and you have the top of trees for company and a cool breeze. covered if it rains to keep your tent dry.

name: Huge free parking
description: Close to the beach, huge free parking. In the daytime there's driving lessons there and a playground. Nobody disturbed us. Boats for Great Backwater are 30 minute walk or 150 Inr rickshaw.

name: Khajuraho Ranco Homestay
description: Nice quite place managed by english speaking hosts. Food is also served and very delicious. They also provide lotnof info about the area and also ready to take you around. Price very reasonable.

name: Bhima Kunda
description: It is famous tourist place at Thakurmuda known as Bhimkunda

name: Multi Car Workshop
description: Repair our silencer (exhaust pipe) quickly and properly. Nice staff, they speak english. Easy to reach with big rigs (on 66 highway)

name: HDFC Bank - for Visa/Master
description: Possible to get max. 10.000 rupees for 200 atm fee. Visa or mastercard possible.

name: Sanctityferme
description: Sanctityferme is a 130-acre + community farm with 17+ villa stay options and a camping site. The farm has multiple activities, including horse riding, trekking, and a swimming pool. Per person including all the activities and places for pitching tents 1500 Rs per person, there is wifi connectivity in common areas and a farm restaurant.

name: Inner line permit office
description:
You can get your inner line permit here to enter Sikkim. 8am to 8pm. 
You will need a copy of your passport and visa along with a passport size photo. You can get these at a nearby shop just on the other side of the border.
Initial Permits are for about 5-7 days, extension is supposed to be possible.
There is no fee for the permit, it took about 15 minutes to complete and was very straightforward process. 

We had heard that it can be difficult to get a Chinese visa if you have a Sikkim stamp in your passport not sure how true this is but we asked for them to stamp a piece of paper and staple it into our passport after explaining this to them they where happy to do this.

As a foreigner, as soon as you enter Sikkim you need the inner line permit (ILP). Otherwise your illegally there and no accommodation will host you. Valid for areas (see picture). In Gangtok you can get the protected area permit (PAP) for some more areas. But most border places are off limits for foreigners.

name: Achara Beach
description:
Dream beach, no shade. You can park on the parking or directly on the sea front.
Nobody around but might become busy on weekends or holidays

name: Fort Nifti
description:
Open space on hilltop near Fort Nifti. The perfect place for overnight or a week of camping. Beautiful sunset, overlooking a breathtaking beach with palm trees.
Some people came in the evening to enjoy the sunset, but they didn't bother us at all.
Digital detox: No Airtel signal !!!

name: Leopard Quary
description:
Flat place in a quarry on the way to butterfly beach. 200m after "Leopard Valley Resort".
Very quiet, just some cars were passing during daytime. No Airtel

name: Wanderlust restaurant and campsite
description: Nice restaurant and campsite. They let you park and camp just beside the restaurant. You can use the shower and toilet. It's for free  when you eat in the restaurant. Very nice place!

name: Khanapur
description:
Perfect place en route between Hampi/Badami and Ellora/Ajanta.
Big level grass land close to the highway, few curious locals during the day. Very quiet at night.
Poor connection with Airtel...

name: close to Bahuti Waterfalls
description: We spend here a quiet night. No disturbance at all. Flat huge area.

name: Mercedes workshop
description: it's the official Mercedes workshop in New Delhi

name: Grassy flat area (no vehicular access)
description: Going through the road you can see 4 basic walls on the side 100m away. You just have to walk a bit and find a place that suits you , everything is grass. Chill place too, no locals, just a bit of noise from a temple nearby, stops at 8pm and starts at 5am again.

name: Free parking near old center
description: All around this small park there are several free parking possibilities.  It is located 15 minutes walk from the ghats.  It's relatively quiet for parking in the city center. We spent 2 nights there without being disturbed.  We asked for permission from the neighborhood, who told us that it was no problem for them.

name: Motor Heart
description: A good mechanic and car wash, we got a oil and filter change as well as a steering boot fixed very helpful and did a good job

name: The Turning Point Dry Cleaners
description: Very good laundry service, friendly and honest (they weigh the laundry in front of you).  It costs 85 INR /Kg.  We also had an XXL fleece blanket (300 inr) and an XXL duvet (700 inr).  Everything was returned folded, in excellent condition and very clean.  You have to go up to the 2nd floor of the building.

name: Wasteland in Sarnat
description: We spent one night here before visiting the Buddhist temples of Sarnat.  It is a vast wasteland where it is possible to park for free.  Accessible with all types of vehicles.  Less than 10 minutes walk from the historic center.

name: United India Insurance Co. Ltd
description: Car insurance for any person including Pakistan, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Bangalades and Butan

name: Gouvernement shelter
description:
Old Colonial House, now dedicated to travellers, it’s know as a « governement shelter », it’s free, the guards showed us the place.
There is rooms, beds but no water.
Very nice place

name: Fardapur
description:
The owner is building a resort and asked me to put his coordinates on this app, he is happy to welcome overlanders on his land.
It's situated only 2 km from the caves in the little village of Fardapur.
Since he's only finishing the first 6 cottages out of 27, there's more than enough place to park your car/motorbike!

name: The Wolfgang after Goa
description:
Great place to stay and explore the region around Hampi. Great for big rigs. Close to boulders. Scooters rental close for 250rupees / day. Relatively clean and really quiet.
We stayed almost a week without any issues. Good Wi-Fi connection.

name: Gada
description:
In between the cotton fields, plenty of room, one can even move closer to the river.
Not for big rigs though since the access road is pretty narrow (vans ok).
Good 4G reception with Airtel.

name: Tumbledry
description: Laundry per kilo available (10/01/24:150 roupies/kg). Good services, 22kg we’re ready in 1 day. Staff friendly and helpful.

name: Water
description: Water tank next to the road. No idea if drinkable or not.

name: Spots close to temple and possible Leopard sighting
description:
Nice spots (with trash like in most of the places in india). It‘s located next to a temple and to a park full nilgais, cows and other animals. At night if you re lucky you might see a Leopard. One local came by to help us find them and didn‘t ask for any money.

The local forest guards came by to make sure we wouldn’t leave our dog outside during the night as it might get eaten. He also told us that, as long as we walk around in groups of people we were not in danger (even when sleeping in a tent).

name: His Grace camping site
description: This is the camping site just next to the beach with provision of tent stay, rooms along with the common washroom.

name: Ocean beach stay
description: This is the camping ground opposite to the honnavar beach with 2pax and 3pax tent stay options. It also has the provision of male and female separate washrooms.

name: The Rose
description: dirty Hotel, they wanted 1000 I negotiated to 600 rupie. but really friendly.

name: Fresh Water Resource
description: super clean and nice water. We used it for over 10 days for cooking, cleaning, cleaning teeth. Locals drink from it!

name: water tap
description: three water taps where you can put your hose (better adapter. The tap nozzle is very thin) the people on the street are very friendly. place to stop and refill water without hindering traffic.

name: Water station
description: Water station with filtered water5rp/20liter or for free if you have own filters

name: Wild camp
description: place to spend the night in a camper or with a tent. Near the road, you can hear car noises but in general the place is quiet. You barely see 1-2 people passing by a day. we spent two nights here.

name: Green meadows eco camp
description: Small camp ground with onsite tents and areas to camp, has an onsite restaurant and adequate toilet and shower facilities

name: quite parking lot
description: Quite car park behind the Beach. The old city is approx 3 km away, but it can be reached by a nice walk along the water. Toilets are available just 50m away from parking.

name: Taxi Parking
description:
Private parking place of a taxi business. The owner is very friendly and let us park/sleep here. He asked for 500Rs per night, but is negotiable to 300Rs/night.

Close to Taj Mahal and pretty quiet as 100m from here the pedestrian zone begins.

During the day until 10pm, there is always someone around and watching.

name: Chase the snake
description:
Great spot to stay near by the bouldering area „chase the snake“ (2min access).
We stayed more than a week and it was absolutely quiet.

Sometimes some locals passed by.
You can get water at Apus Cafe for free.

You can also order a water tanktrailer for 1000rupees!

name: Watersource (Fountain)
description: Watersource in the Mountains with drinkable Water

name: Jio BP Petrol Pump
description: Lots of area to park behind the petrol pump and next to the restaurant. They have clean toilet and bathing facilities. The food at the restaurant is also reasonably priced, in case interested

name: Wild camping
description: the quietest place we have slept in India. The road is a little sandy without a problem (not for large trucks). It is located just past the other iOverlander point that is nearby. you have to go through the door of the other marked iOverlander. a stone fence that the left side is fallen.

name: Water tap on road
description: Crank faucet on the side of the road. The water comes out quite clear and it is easy to park for any vehicle

name: Osara Hostel
description:
A excellent hostel run by Armaan, first proper hostel in Bodh Gaya
Beautiful rooms dorms and area to chill. Very close to the temple but still in a quite neighbourhood

name: gauge
description: It is a barrier so that only cars can pass. There is a Galo or and you have to take a turn to enter Jaipur

name: place near the road
description: This place is near the road. but it is very quiet (you can only hear the road in the distance) no one passes by all night. Suitable for vehicles of all sizes. Although the path may seem sandy, there is no problem at all in walking it.

name: Terrace Tatto
description: It is a restaurant where we ate for €6 per person (2 burgers, salad, non-alcoholic mojito, water) sitting on a terrace in front of the Hawa Mahal. The views to eat are impressive. If you just want to go up to the terrace to take photos it is 250 rupees per person. very quiet to eat for what India is. vegetarian restaurant with many options

name: place to make henna
description: If you want to get henna done, this place is fine. 800 rupees for both hands (20 minutes) one person did each hand for me. You sit on a stool and choose your design from an album.

name: Bombay Restaurant
description: Nice clean restaurant on the first floor with delicious food for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Lots of choices. We can recommend especially the Masala Dosa. Friendly staff. Lot of locals come here to eat.

name: Wild camp
description: place to spend the night. At night no one passes by. In the morning some person crossed. It is a place under construction, which seems totally paralyzed. At night you can hear hotel music, but until 11:00 p.m. or so. In truth, India is never completely calm.

name: Tata motors. Truck workshop
description: Big truck workshop. If they can't fix it for you, they'll find you another mechanic (local market). It's possible to stay overnight outside the workshop.

name: hindu temple
description:
Hindi temple right before Faizabad on the main road, 
very nice and quiet people they would invite you for a night or two without any problem, and they'll even make food for you. 
quiet and peacefull place.

name: little ferry for cyclists and foot passanger
description:
The ferry is right here. take the smal road to get here or ask locals for „shifting“.
20Rupies pP and pBicycle

name: Wild camping
description: Peaceful place. You can hear the road a little but at night the noise decreases a lot so you can sleep peacefully.

name: Dr.Dhawal Goyal
description: India's Best Dental Clinic, DNG dental clinic in Jaipur, believes in giving major emphasis on conceptual treatment. The clinic has strived and succeeded in providing quality, advanced dental care at affordable cost.

name: Highway Hotel
description: Good Thali for around 150rs if you don’t want to step inside the town of Purnia and continue straight to Siliguri/darjeeling

name: Oyo Dev Guesthouse
description:
The best place we could find in Jodhpur. The street next to it gets rather quiet over night. The parking of this guesthouse is spacious and secure.
We paid 300Rs per night to park and sleep in the van.

name: Amazing nature spot close to lake
description: Really amazing nature spot overlooking an artificial lake. It’s calm, its clean and there is a nice view!

name: bandhavgargh ticket counter
description:
Here is the place for Booking the Safaris. There is always a 10% of the tickets sold not-online the previous day+ the cancelled ones.

usually the tour agencies book in advance all the safaris and try to sell double price, the day before you have plenty of them in the real local price.

we did 2 safaris, shared ones with Indian people. for two people the prices where
Weekdays: 1640 for the permit and 1166 Jeep+guide
On weekends: 2020 for the permit and 1166 Jeep+guide

If wanted to do a private onefull Jeep, on weekdays is 5200 and It is possible to arrange per 100 or 200rp pick up in your hotel.

Safari is about 4 to 5h with a break where there are tea/coffe stalls, samosas an toilets!

Ask the best area before choosing the core-zone.. Despite Tala is the most popular, during our visit they tell us Kithauli was having more seeings, (we did Tala tour and 0 tigers :( )

name: Wild camping in the fortress
description: place to sleep inside the fortress. The road has stones, but does not require a 4x4. Just driving carefully. You can't be seen from the road, super quiet night

name: Prime Adventure Tours
description:
Prime adventure tours offer Taxi Services In Jaipur. Book a full day taxi in Jaipur. We offer a wide range of booking services. Along with Jaipur, we offer our taxi service in all cities in Rajasthan

With a determination to provide a world-class experience, Prime Adventure Tours is proud to introduce superior car rental services in Jaipur.

name: Lakeside Adventure
description: An camp ground with multiple tent spots,  a large lake to swim in, clean bathrooms hot water, kitchen with yummy International cuisine cooked to order big rig friendly, swimming pool at the foot hills of the deccan plateau. 60Kms to a famous hill town Kodaicanal. best visited Nov - Feb. this place has very clean cottages and rooms if you want to the a break saimeena123@live.com

name: Crocodile dam
description: Nice spot beautiful crocodile leopard etc but in general just beautiful just don’t swim

name: Calm and nature close to pune
description: Calm and clean spot close to the city of Pune. I could even imagine staying there a few days. 4g is weak.

name: shell
description: test location for ev fast charger for charging quickly

name: Spot very quiet close temple
description: Very quiet place in the parking lot of a temple and very close to the caves. There is a house next door so we asked permission to stay the night and they told us there was no problem. In the afternoon and early morning some locals come to the temple, but surprisingly no one cared in the least about our presence

name: Jayabunda MIP
description: This  is a irrigation project uner MI Sub Division Udala coming underI Division Mayurbhanj

name: Dr.Minati Mishra Eye Slp.
description: She is Eye Speciallist Doctor at Baripada Badbazar

name: Drinkable water station
description:
Small company that filters water and sells them in 20L bottles. We filled up our water tank and drink from it without problems - though the taste is not like real bottled water.

Price was 30Rs per 20L water.

name: Primrose Hotel
description: very good and clean Hotel for 2000 rp per night

name: Free parking at hotel
description:
Nice parking of a restaurant/hotel with quite some green around. They let us park here for 3 nights for free. One night we slept there, the others we were on camel safari with Ketha (see other entry).

Forgot to take a picture - next people here, please add one :)

name: Car park next to a home stay
description: Flattish concrete car park, just before the end of the road. Cost 100Rp to park for the night where more then happy for us to stay in our vehicle

name: Swarg Dwari View point
description: A litle concrete road leads to the little parking Spot. A few locals are there in the evening. Very quiete at night. A path through the rocks leads down to the river, and a litle beach.

name: Chotu's farm
description:
Chotu's Farm is a paradise in India. The farm is fenced and you can park in its garden. It is perfect for all types of overlanders, also for large trucks. The family welcomes you wonderfully, making you feel like one of the house. They also make good European bread and croissants as they have a bakery in the village. They have a big flower plantation, dogs, a horse, cows, peacocks, during the day it is very quiet, no car whistles. The market and the sacred lake is just a 10-minute walk away. Totally recommended. 
+919660319089

name: Chotu's French bakery and South Indian Food Pushkar
description: Good place for breakfast with European bread, sandwiches,... and pastries with croissants in house made...also you can eat different kinds of food. A very cozy and quiet place (you can play chess). I recommend.

name: Water filling station
description:
They sell filtered drinking water. You can fill up your water tank with a hose or by using 20L bottles.

We drink from it without issues. 30Rs for 20 liters.

name: Express cleaners
description: Very good service nice people honoust price good guys

name: Big parking spot behind petrol station
description: A big parking lot behind the gas station. The place is safe and quiet. You can fill water with great preassure. Good for big rigs.

name: Koekeldoedeldoe
description: Nice spot and surprise surprise for those who are picky there is some garbage wel good luck to find one without … please let me know  nice spot some packs of dogs but very nice once’s. Good spot beautiful beach enjoy

name: Parking at wendsday market by private house
description:
Nice parking spot by a very sweet Indian family in the middle of the wendsday market. There is only one spot under a tree, most of the day you will have shade.  Wendsdays of course busy but the other days are ok with noise. The family is very helpful and kind. Contact the owner of the place before you arrive to check if it's available. Fresh and clean water also available, comfortable fill up with hoose. He will ask for a little parking fee, but it's more then worse it! We parked here for 3 weeks and it was amazing to be with this kind people. Enjoy
phone number of Aniket: +917798533346

name: Orion uptown supermarket
description: very modern supermarket inside the shopping center.  There is also a bakery where you can find bread and tasty puff pastry snacks.  You can really find everything: food, kitchen and bathroom utensils, etc. Good prices, European cards work. Good paid parking

name: water selling
description: Here you can buy 20l bottles of drinking water and other little stuff

name: Sunset point cliff near Kudle Beach
description: This point is known for its amazing sunsets. It is atop a cliff and is open to public. We found some visitors from the nearby hostel during sunset but no one else. They said that the place is patrolled by the local police during weekends to prevent public drinking/ smoking. We were not disturbed thereafter. To get there, take the dirt road between the loosely kept rocks.

name: Bundi coffee
description:
Nice guy, definitely recommend middle east breakfast (hummus etc)... espresso nice too. If you are enough with oily fry fat heavy spicy Indian food, this is the place.
Unfortunately sometime the guy smokes inside, tell him to avoid it ;)

name: Kaneri math bus parking open land
description:
Siddhagiri Gramjivan Museum 
This place open parking space for buses but we stay overnight. it’s opposite kaneri math a barren land & no one disturb us you can visit math for washroom and water needs the math serve food too and do check the museum for village experience 
We visited in afternoon so not sure about the evening timing of math you can check with near by villagers , best part is sunrise

name: Parking field next to the highway
description: Exiting the Highway, on the road to Karanja, you will find on the right a dirt road to the field. There were some shepherds far away, but they didn't bother us all night, no one came, it's quiet and we spent a night here. Fine for big rigs

name: Ample of parking space next to higway
description: Kamat upchar a beautiful place next to highway & fuel station , pump has water and washroom facilities next there is CCD n old and good restaurant hotel staff very friendly staff ask us to park underneath the tree in afternoon and in night outside if the parking is getting full.

name: Customs Nightmare
description:
We shipped our vehicle (Van in Container) from Oman to India Mumbai. 

The Seacustom is not able to handle vehicles under CDP. They will take it as Import ONLY. We had several meetings with high ranked custom officers and the FIAA of India. The support is very bad. 

I think it will be possible, but it takes at least one Week. And it will make you crazy. 

If you considre to ship your vehicle, try to make it as empty as possible. 

The BOL MUST contain every item of your car and make shure every single detail mentioned in the CDP is exactly the same wording. 

They will take appart every single word.

name: Temple on the beach
description: We drove down the beach east of here and found a lovely spot tucked up in the trees, but the locals showed up and told us it was not safe to camp here and directed us to a temple 2 km down the beach. There is a lovely grassy area next to it. We where left alone overnight but lots of friendly visitors in the morning

name: La Maison Citroën
description:
Citroën and Jeep workshop. The bellows of the homokinetic joint of our Jumper van broke and although they could not find a replacement, they managed the repair together with another workshop where they made the rubber bellows for us. 

Very friendly staff. We were able to sleep at the door of the workshop with access to the bathroom when we wanted, since there is security all night

name: Top of the hill
description: There is an open area at the top of the hill with a beautiful view and plenty of evidence of other people camping here. We talked to some locals that were around and they said to tell anyone that asked that we had permission to camp here. We were for the most part left alone.

name: Climbingpalooza
description: Nice spot but first get in contact with Ganesh . See climbing badami. Just in front of the rock where the monkeys touch the sky and you probably there poo if you climb

name: Khajuraho at Western Temples
description: This is a big, flat, empty concrete area with a fence around and high lamps. We spent one day and one night parking here and noone disturbed us. A local suggested us this place to stay over night with our big truck, since the other place on Ioverlander is closed for public now.. It is very close to the Western Temples. To come here you have to take the bypass road, do not try to drive through the town.

name: INTI PUSHKAR HOSTEL
description:
Nice new hostel, with wonderful garden and clean. Parking inside for bikes and maybe a car. Not far from Town. Nice vibes. There are some private huts 
Bargain the price you see on Hostelworld or booking ;)

name: Spot near highway. Truck parking
description: Next to the highway you will find a truck parking. You cross it and after that you fill find a big place for parking. Some truck drivers curious, as normal. On the way to Kajuraho.

name: Missing Bridge
description: Bridge missing! There is constructionwork going on. might be possible to cross from summer 2024 on. (1/3 of the hole brige is completly gone and aboute to get new constructed)

name: Unity food court
description: Perfect restaurant for tourist who scared about Indian food. So clean ! Amazing food and large ranch. Nice worker and owner. Green area, playground. Easy parking. Cheap and good. That’s a 5 stars restaurant for everyone!

name: Side of the highway jungle camp
description: A large open space tucked in a few hundred metres off the highway on a dirt track, plenty of open space and trees to tuck in behind. We saw a few places off the highway that looked like they would lead somewhere to camp if you have time to poke around.

name: Veterinarian
description: All for your pets, shop, food, veterinarian, surgery...a big place

name: Chaya Budget Lodge/Hotel
description:
Nice and clean Hotel. I‘ve paid 350Rupies for a double bed room. They take foreigners.
Some of the staff speak English, bicycle friendly! :-)

name: Frogricepaddyparadice
description: Hey, hey good and quiet spot, every 2 days there will be water to flood the rice paddy’s. Don’t drink it unless you are a crocodile. But good for shower. This is the end for big rigs, have fun, some rainbow people a bit further, they mean no harm :)

name: Immigration Check-Point India
description: Here you get your exit stamp when leaving India to Nepal. (Travelling from Nepal to India is not possible at this boarder crossing).

name: Topgear Automotive Solutions Kersi
description: A fantastic workshop working on an amazing selection of vehicles from all around the world. It is the sort of work shop that you could bring any vehicle and they will have a solution for your problems. Keisi the owner speaks perfectly English and is incredibly helpful

name: Shining Beach
description:
a lonely beach with firefly and lots of shining plancton!
I arrived in the dark and was fascinated by the firefly. But when I went for a nightbath in the sea I couldn‘t beleef it!! 
But hey, no shinging rubbish here…

name: AJ. Hotel and lodging
description: you can sleep in the parking or in the hotel. Veri helpful people an very good food

name: Close to papaji house
description:
Great spot in a quiet natural setting. A local who lives in the fields next to this spot will be delighted to welcome you to drink tea and share evenings around the fire. His name is papaji.

There are plenty of opportunities to walk around and climb the mountains.

name: Home kallu family
description:
Farmer Kallu will be delighted to welcome you to his family. You can park your vehicle in his farmyard. He speaks very good English and will be happy to help you and share time with you.

Number Kallu : +91 91795 58832

name: Next to the highway
description: Beside a petrol station there is a field next to the highway. Just to spend one night on the way to Nepal border. We were alone, quiet and no one came.

name: Nice place not to fare from Chitrakoot
description: Quiet spot in the middle of nature under the trees near a small village. A few curious locals but nothing disturbing.

name: Water at Fuel Station
description: The worker at the Fuel station helped us refill our 40l water tank. It was a real nice Guy

name: Parking Spot with shadow close to the sea
description:
Shady parking spot under palm trees. across is a field. Shadow almost all day long! It's on a paid parking place, the price it's 300 per 24h. we stayed 8 days and he didn't went down with the price. but try because the location and beach it's amazing there. 
The parking guy also makes dosa breakfast and sells coconut. 
fresh water is available for free. 
Close by is the Bagavan cafe, where the food is really good, compere to what is around. 
Left side of it is the kuchal cafe which is very chilly and super cheap. Food standard taste. 

the road to get there is tiny road. but we findet. 7m.long

name: Parking next to the beach
description: Good open spot (also for big rigs) to stay right next to the beach at day and also night time.Few friendly locals come to visit, especially in evening time for marriage foto shoots. Beautiful beach, bit of rubbish, but frequently cleaned up.

name: Shibira
description:
This is a beautiful, secluded campground has everything you would need, from clean bathrooms to an on-site restaurant. Best of all, it is incredibly quiet and peaceful.
Access is from the north, past the pin in Google Maps. Take a left at the fork and follow the track for approx. 700 m (Google Satellite shows the access)

name: Bagdadi Restaurant
description: Cheap and good restaurant. Ask the staff for recommendations.

name: Punjabi Dhaba
description: A small road side dhaba( restaurant) on the way to Jorhat. with tiled parking space, very good tea, budget friendly menu, and toilets. ideal for short hop to have some tea and fix some things in the vehicle.

name: Highway Grill
description: Some distance away from the highway towards Khaziranga Narional Park, a clean one hall restaurant, parking space, clean toilets behind the restaurant, budget friendly, few swings for kids, outside sitting area, a small room for bathing.

name: Manic Mechanic
description: A good locale Mechanic. We messaged them on WhatsApp the afternoon before and they did the service we needed the next day

name: Camping at Nubra valley
description: Place is really good to camp. car and bike can take to that place . many travelers camp here who come on bike. please don’t throw any waste in this area else you may face problem with locals. camp was close to mini river and you can see in picture which i have uploaded. temperature can drop to minus at night. the location is not accurate but you can find easily.

name: Kesha Homestay & Campsite
description: Homestay and Campsite 6kms from Roing, near Mehao Wildlife sanctuary, on the way to Anini. Ample parking space for overlanding rigs, cottages and camping area is avaliable. Food and resting area avaliable.Pet friendly and helpful staff. Budget friendly quiet serene place, a calm place to stop.

name: At the lake
description: A nice and peaceful place to pitch your tent. The ground is flat and grassy. From the food and tea stalls it’s a five minute walk. I asked the owner of one of the shops if I could leave my bicycle and some equipment overnight with him.

name: Homestay
description: A lovely homestay, run by a lovely family. I had a great stay and can recommend this place to everyone.

name: camping at kappad beach parking lot
description: very near to the beach there is parking lot. near to a temple near there is a restaurant and  small shop .also local people wil be there even very late .if you have tent you have lot of places to put. for heavy vehicles can also reached here.

name: Easy my Storage
description:
Storage facility for Luggage, furniture, vehicles.
The vehicles will be parked in an underground garage, the other things in their storage compartment (things will be packed in cartoon boxes and plastic foil wrapped).
Good communication and friendly staff. Prices seem reasonable.

And friend and mine both stored our motorcycles + luggage here for three months. Price was about 2100 rupees per month. Nothing to complain about. Just the building/shop is not easy to find because there are no big signs. Check pictures and meet them in front of the building.

name: Aitel Shop for SIM Cards
description: This is the first place after Népal which agreed to make us a new SIM card.  The guy is really nice and helpful.

name: Bhoomi Motors
description: This mechanic is really serious and skillful. We broke a part of the clutch transmitter, and the van could no longer drive. We were stuck at the side of the road. The guy came several times to see the van, he managed to craft a new part and fixed it. We definitely recommend this garage !

name: The Dhoby Junction
description:
Very efficient and cheap  complete laundry service.
We had our laundry picked up, washed, dried and folded within 24h at The Dhobi Junction.
80 rps / kg so approximately 1€/kg + 100rps for the pick up and delivery.
I could communicate through Google service and then WhatsApp. They are reactive.
It's clean.

name: Gwalior Fort
description:
Well maintained fort from the 3rd century.
There's two different tickets for various sites (300 rupees, the other 400 rupees).
The 300r ticket contains two temples a few hundred meters off the main sight.

To best reach the fort us the "Urvai Gate" to drive till top and car park.

There's also a light show in the evening (see Pic)

name: Hotel Sunset
description:
Amazing Ho(s)tel. Very friendly staff, good location and the best view of town from the rooftop. Breakfast and secure parking available (also for a van up to 2,5/3m height). Big rigs might have difficulty with the streets anyway.

Room Fan: 600r, AC: 1100r, Dorm 200r

name: Eva‘s Homestay
description:
Great place to stay. Lovely family who takes good care of their guests. we stayed two nights and paid 1500 Rupies per night.  Room is super clean, WiFi is very good. You can use the kitchen and living room. Their is also a water filter to refill bottles. 
we could park our Ford Ranger next to the house.

name: Orchha Fort
description:
Nice, old and quite big fort complex. Definitely cooler than Gwalior.

Bring at least 1,5h.
The ticket costs 750r, but is valid for one day and all sights in Orchha (also the other temples, etc.).

Most of them close around sunset.
After sunset you can see the Shri Ram Raja temple, which opens in the evening until 10pm

name: Camp near uttarkashi (no vehicular access)
description: This place is very good for camping with your own tent by yourself at night. Some locals will be there, and you should not throw any waste at this place else you may face problems with the locals because this place is near temple and ganga (bhagiradhi) river flows. You may feel cold at night, so prepare yourself. You need to cross the bridge and only 2 wheeler can pass from the bridge and you can park after crossing and need to walk down 10 min aprox.

name: The Royal Inn
description:
Nice hotel with big double rooms. All comfy and well maintained.
AC double was 1285r (booking.com).

Safe parking inside for motorcycle/car.

name: Rajendra Sweets & Milk
description:
Best Dosa and all the good south indian food!! Don‘t miss this place, it‘s super local, fair prices and soooo delicious food.
There is also a good pharmacy just opposite of it.

name: Expressway rest area
description: Good for one night between Lucknow and. Delhi. Big tarmac rest area parking lot.

name: LPG filling station
description: LPG refill station. You might need your own adapter.

name: Live Free Hostel
description:
Friendly staff, nice hostel, with good communal area, restaurant, dorms and privat rooms. Beds are comfy.
I paid about 800r for an AC 8 bed dorm.

Parking for a handful of motorcycles is possible inside the yard. No cars though.

name: Parking and Camping at Varkala Beach
description:
Parking area in the cliff. good for some nights. Make a good price with the parking staff for the amount of nights you want to stay. 
Rubbish and no facilities makes it a little less attractive.

name: Mrityunjay Motors
description: We came across Kunal by chance when we had a big break related problem. While he does normally do mechanical works, he was very helpful to find a mechanic and support us with everything. He speaks English and insisted he is more than happy to help others overlanders passing by.

name: Hotel Garden Villa
description:
Really friendly owner and staff. Good rooms and food. Safe parking for motorcycle/car inside.
They even received a parcel for me in advance. Would come again :)
Double AC was 1000r, dinner 120r

name: Hotel Yash Raj
description:
Big Hotel, rooms and overall appearance is very well maintained and looks nice.
Secure and big parking lot for multiple cars, also big rigs possible.
Double AC is 2350r, breakfast incl. 
Staff does not speak English.

name: Free Parking not far from McLeod Ganj
description: A relatively big dirt parking lot, opposite to the small Dal Lake. Calm during the night. However at 6 in the morning there is a ceremony with music in the nearby Buddhist monastery. McLeod Ganj or other villages or hiking spots easily reachable by riksha or taxi.

name: Hotel Saluja - Budget Friendly
description:
Pretty cool Hotel. Quite big, but they have cheap single fan rooms for 720r, as well as more luxurious rooms for a bigger budget.
Food (room service) all day round.
Big and safe parking lot in the backyard.
Personal is very friendly.

name: Washouse drycleaning and laundry service
description:
Establishment that washes, dries and folds your laundry per kg (the only one we found in Jaipur) for 100 rps/kg for everything except undergarment which are 10 rps / pieces to add.  Excluding tax (18%). Pick up and delivery included.
Our laundry was delivered in less than 24h on a Sunday morning during a Holliday festival : very kind people.
Whatsapp Contact : +91 6350 280 969

name: Military Checkpoint - ILP
description:
Military Checkpoint for inner line permit. From here you enter northern Sikkim.
(location might not be 100% accurate, but it was somewhere before the bridge.)

name: Zostel & Camping
description:
The Zostel is pretty new, since three months.
Big main building with dorms, private rooms and sitting area. 
Nice communal area outside (sheltered) and all day restaurant.
It's very secluded in nature and if your lucky with clear skies you can even see the Kangchenjunga. 

They also have two big patches of grass and some sheltered spot for tents. Camper vans will easily fit, as well. Big rigs, too, at the parking side adjacent, the only question is if you make it the way up. But should be possible for normal size trucks. Although all roads are narrow'ish around here.

Staff is really nice and they have the cutest couple of dogs :)

name: La Maison
description:
Really sweet Homestay runned by a french-indian couple. We could park the Camper safely in the ground and stayed in the rooms right next to tha Camper. we also could have slept in the camper and only use the bathroom. Price was 500 INR per day for min. one week. They were very kids friendly. 
Not for big rigs.

name: Highway service area
description: Quiet place for park before or after Delhi. Not so much traffic. Petrol station, restaurants and workshop available but A lot of mosquitos

name: Max Vets Hospital
description: Quite a large veterinary hospital with all services, including a store and pharmacy. We were able to easily find medication for our dog's epilepsy. Everything seems very clean and professional

name: Hotel Palace
description:
Clean rooms, AC hot water TV, friendly staff, close to everything, I took a newly renovated room @ 2200 INR.
Secure parking for motorcycles. Perfect place to reset before or after Wagah border. I stayed 4 nights - 2 days Dehli-Belly.

name: Big empty space next to a mall
description: This is a good alternative to stay in Amritsar. Located 10 minutes drive from the center, this is a big empty area where nobody came during the 4 nights we spent there. Really quiet ! It's next to a big mall with a Decathlon and a supermarket Smart Bazar. During the day, we drove to the city center to visit (we used to park free here : 31.630830,74.871089). Good 4G. Toilets in the mall.

name: Melli Checkpoint (ILP)
description:
You can get the inner line permit (ILP) / exit stamp here.
Same info as for Rangpo applies >>> see there.

Only the two crossings are allowed for foreigners.

name: Big Parking area near Resorts
description: Good parking place to stay. A little far from center, but ok to find rickshaw from shilpgram (150-200 roupies to get in the center). Very easy for big rigs.

name: Setia Hotel
description:
Basic hotel - AC, hot water, reasonably clean. Secure gated parking for motorcycles. Restaurant on-site. I paid 1200 INR.
Good enough for a night.

name: Per Mart Supermarket
description: supermarket with good stock! 2 floors. no fresh things. no cheese. no vegetables. Everything else available. prices are ok.

name: Thar Exotica Hotel
description:
A wedding type “resort” place/hotel. Clean rooms, AC hot water. Restaurant on-site. Secure compound with garden. Secure parking. Breakfast included.
Expensive @ 3500 INR - but works for a night to get out of the heat.

name: Hotel PooNam
description:
Budget accommodations - relatively clean rooms, AC, restaurant on-site, friendly staff, semi-secure parking in hotel lot with 24 hr attendant CCTV.
I paid 1200 INR.

name: Hotel Regents
description:
Basic clean Hotel rooms - AC TV hot water - friendly staff - close to food. Semi secure parking for bikes - 24 hr security and CCTV.
I paid 2100 INR.

name: Indian oil LPG
description:
We managed to fill up our cylinder with LPG here, at last. The total station close to this station had refused. But here, after a call to the boss, they accepted.
They also agreed to fill up our tank of water.

name: Hotel Ashwin
description:
Clean rooms - close to airport. AC hot water western style large rooms. Secure private parking area - perfect location for riders. Very good place to reset gear and do general maintenance on bikes. Friendly helpful staff.
I paid $40USD/night - well worth it.

name: Hotel Niranta Airport
description:
Hotel inside of terminal 2 - level 4.
Convenient hotel inside of airport terminal. Go to departures - level 4.
Clean comfortable rooms, very convenient if taking early/late flights. Restaurant on-site.
I paid $65USD/night.

name: Coorg Water Park
description:
We asked for an overnight stay here, with a big rig, without being customers, and the manager accepted.
We parked at the bottom of the parking lot, not to bother any customer of the restaurant, but there were very few, it was the back season. It was very quiet. Very well located for leaving early in the morning for Mysore.

name: Sleep stop
description:
Between the tea hills, near a stadium, a small road with very little traffic widens to a flat place.  This is where we had a sleep stop before hitting the road early towards Munnar, coming from Ooty.
 It's fenced everywhere, there are one or two residents, if you ask them you could probably even park in front of one of them.
 It is very calm and very beautiful.
 The road is in good condition, but narrow, we passed with a big rig anyway.

name: Pine forest Near Daringbadi
description: good site to pitch a tent. there is a small stream nearby.

name: Nilayam
description: Nilayam is two bedroom apartment including  an attic . The location in at outskirts of Simla city enabling  guest to avoid traffic  congestion of Simla . Nilayam provide 360 degree  view .

name: Where 2 bridges collide
description: Nice spot at old bridge safe of falling rocks!! Nice village beautiful people and no rubbish. Enjoy and always remember , the grass is greener at the other side of the bridge

name: Peanut butter mountain on the moon
description: Great spot , was like old construction site in this beautiful landscape. You park just above this nice pile of wept cream enjoy and don’t forget to to bring your spoon

name: Sahyadri veg non veg hotel Tahmini ghat
description: Behind the restaurant they have a small ground where I took my vehicle and camp. It’s on the base of a small hill. The view in the morning is magnificent. The weather was comfortable even when India was going through heatwave.

name: Tumbledry & laundry service
description:
We had our 12 kg of laundry washed and folded within 24h here. Everything came back clean and unspoiled. We had it delivered for free because it was more than 3 kg. 
The rate was 150 rps / kg for express service ( 24h) but we negotiated for 120 rps because of the big weight. If you're not in a hurry it's 100 rps ready within 48 hours.
People were very kind. We recommend this place.

name: Botanical Garden Parking
description: Parking area for daytime, good place to clean up and find lost stuff in the car. Quiet, cool area, with no hassles. There is one small grovery shop 2 mins away. Area  is clean and slightly wooded. wooden benches inside the garden to relax. Good place to plan, ponder and quarrel. Away from the clutter.

name: Him Homestay
description: Perfect homestay. Clean room, very nice owner. Above a cafe (crazy monk) where you can eat wonderfull food. View is amazing. Price is good.

name: Mountain madness
description: Nice spot next the road but plenty of place to stand , no traffic during the night beautiful mountains all around enjoy

name: The rice bowl, Tibetan restaurant
description: Very nice restaurant, good food friendly owners , family style! Very calm also!!

name: Donzia
description: Best momo’s in town!! Friendly family restaurant with fresh and great food

name: Place full of mechanic
description: Good mechanic everything can be fixed here with some patience. Most parts are here but if not they order by plane . We have broken fuel pump and inshallah it will be fixed :)

name: Hotel Golden Look
description:
Great hotel down an small side road so very quiet. Good wifi and nice owner.

Space for Bicycle and small car, motorcycle.

For a double room with AC and bathroom we paid 1200 rupees

name: Kargil River side
description: Flat space that was recommended to us by locals for camping. The road leading here is a dead end, no traffic. Further down is a fish farm and there was only one car passing in the late evening.

name: Hotel Adarsh
description:
Basic hotel, AC, hot water, clean rooms. Restaurant across the street. Secure parking. Breakfast included.
I paid 1400 INR.

name: US dollar exchange for Nepal border
description:
Here you can exchange your Indian rupees into USD before crossing to Nepal (as you will need dollars to pay the visa fee).

Tried quite a few banks and Axis was the only one which said yes.
They outsourced their dollars from elsewhere and I had to wait about 20 minutes, so bear that in mind.
Front desk staff were very nice and helpful and gave plenty of water.

I paid 11,000 rupees for $125, despite the exchange rate being around 10,500 rupees - they said it’s worse rate because I’m paying in cash (but still the only place in the whole city I could find that had crisp dollar notes)

name: Laundry Clean Craft Haldwani
description:
Very good and super friendly laundry Service. They have 2 laundry western machines and two dryers. 2 small, 2 big. 
They let me use the machines by myself. 
I had to pay per kilo/75 rupees.  
I wasched 3 machines and payed in total less then 10€. I had some pieces with difficult stains and they took even extra care of it and also ironing some big curtains for me without charging extra. 
I did almost all by myself, also folding, as I wished so.

name: River Camp
description: Super flat camp spot, perfect for one night on your way up or down. A shop is closed by where you can drink chai or get some snacks. We bought some butter there. You can hear very loud the river running...in the night the sky was incredible full of stars!

name: Osho Parking
description:
If you wish to visit the Osho Meditation Center, this is the right parking for you! It's the official parking and you need first to register yourself to be able to enter the parking. 
Show the security guy on the gate your Osho pass and he will let you enter. There is only one big tree in the middle of the parking! Water we got with the help of a security guy on the main door. In the night quiet and peaceful.

name: Royal Castle
description: Nice Indian Restaurant, super tasty food, nice decor and good atmosphere. Stuff was super friendly. All the dishes we eat was great and they was able to prepare them non-spicy!

name: Hotel Rudra Regency
description:
Mid-range hotel. Clean rooms, AC hot water, restaurant onsite. Parking in front of hotel - 24 hr security safe area.
Breakfast included - range of rooms & prices - I took a deluxe @ $43USD. Good stop before or after Nepal border.

name: Shri Guru Ram Das Ji Niwas
description:
Free hostel for pilgrims
They offered a clean private bedroom with double bed
I was able to bring the bicycle inside my bedroom
Take a small lock with you if you want to be able close the door of your bedroom

name: Bedthi River Caming
description: There is a old bridge with no access right next to the new bridge. We stayed here for the night while our road trip to dandeli on bike. Locals said it was haunted but we didnt feel anyting. We cooked fish in the night and left early morning

name: Perfect spot in the middle of the hills
description:
Really nice spot in the middle of the hills on the way between Dharamshala and Chandigarh. The trek is pretty tight but i don’t think you need a 4x4. From here a lot of unmarked hiking paths leave. There are two leveled areas to park and to turn arround.

To come here take the track at 31.759641, 76.211962.

name: Good for one night
description: Spot in the middle of bushes. Far from a perfect spot but good for one night. Some super friendly locals came over and invited us for a meal.

name: The Raabchic Cafe
description:
Great little cafe in the valley. Owner is a very nice guy and the place is nicely done. 

food and drinks

name: Aiom Ksair Dhaba
description: Restaurant, short term parking, big rig friendly, night parking, toilets, cool, spacious, pit stop, clean, kid and pet friendly, restaurant and homestay,

name: Paradise Adventure Camp and Restaurant
description: Restaurant, pit stop, camper van parking, overnight stop, showers, loo, wifi, cell network works, jio and airtel, 5g, cool open area, bit touristy during day, waterfalls within 3 kms area, small river nearby, streamside camping, many possibilities.

name: Nice flat spot
description: Nice flat spot with great view over the valley.

name: Nice flat ground in the hills
description: Nice flat ground, perfect for one or two nights. Nobody disturbed us.

name: Spot used by locals for picnic
description: There were nicer spot a little more north but we had already driven past them. Here the view is nice. There is a little shop across the street. A few locals came to say high, specially kids but the night was really calm.

name: Old bridge
description: It's hard to find spots in the valley. This road has been condemned due to a landslide which has led to the construction of a new bridge. So the spot is quiet, no one passes here. Access to the spot from the left bank of the river.

name: Siachen Glacier / Base Camp
description:
If you've come to expect seeing the Glacier, don't come. It's far behind the military camp and you can't go there or see it.

The valley and the ride are nice, but there's not too much to see back there.

One simple Cafe, the "I love sign" and that's basically it.

name: Fuel Station (Indian Oil)
description:
Two pump stations, each with petrol and diesel. No fancy shop or roof, very basic.
With Tangtse it's the only fuel station in this area. Next ones are in Leh or Keylong.

I HEARD you can get fuel at some places here and there by bottle, but I wouldn't trust the quality, without a proper filter. If it's even available, of course.

name: Nice place to stay
description: On the way to the old remains of a Bridge. Place for 5 Cars

name: Wildcamp for cyclist
description: Here are two possibilities. Eighter westside around the hug Eucalyptus trees (looks more like a park) or eatside on the other side of the sall bridge many more or less hiden and flat spots to pitch a tent.

name: Hot Springs
description:
Nice Hotsprings and a little town next to it.
The outside pool was too hot, but there seemed to be some bath inside, which might be cooler. Anyway, it‘s healthy and good to relax…

just pass the small temples and you’ll get there!

name: Detour for river crossing /via hills
description:
The river crossing can be quite challenging, even in end of June I didn't find a spot which looks easily doable.

That's why there is a detour possible with the hills so you come out behind the bridge and can cross it to get back to Hanle

name: Camel Farm
description: It is a small parking ground for one Truck direktly by the National Camel Research Farm; save because of the security at the Camel Farm. Friendly people at the shop and also at the farm

name: Inner Line Permit
description:
